name: Captain Molly
description:
THE WEB VERSION IS NOT THE LUDUM DARE SUBMISSION BUT AN IMPROVED BUILD MADE LATER.

Captain Molly is a game about heroism, honor and sacrifice. You play as Molly, a fearless commando, ready to any sacrifice to save innocent kittens. Led by Erwin, you'll have to defeat all the enemies in the Fox Base to complete the mission you have been sent here for.

Made by Éloïse Zirotti and Robin Six in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46.

The game has been designed for controllers and will prioritize them over keyboard/mouse if at least one is plugged. You can still play with keyboard/mouse but make sure to use a controller if possible !

If you want to play and rate us for the Ludum Dare event, make sure to download the LDJAM Submission build. If you simply want to play and enjoy a better version, download the second one !
